dcterms:creator: J. Schwartz
H. Kurniawati
dcterms:description: A Network Attack Simulator (NASim) used as an environment to train reinforcement learning agents to solve predefined security scenarios covering techniques of exploitation, post-exploitation, and wiretapping.
dcterms:title: NASim

dcterms:description: Penbox is an automated penetration testing software that performs security tests against a network using decision trees to execute standard penetration testing tools.
dcterms:title: Penbox
